org.sakaiproject.sms.api
Interface SmsSmpp

All Known Implementing Classes:
SmsSmppImpl
public interface SmsSmpp

This service will contain the necessary logic to communicate with a standard SMPP gateway.

Author:
louis@psybergate.com

Method Detail

connectToGateway

boolean connectToGateway()
Establish a connection to the gateway (bind). The connection will be kept open for the lifetime of the session. Concurrent connections will be possible from other smpp services. The status of the connection will be checked before sending a message, and a auto-bind will be made if possible.

disconnectGateWay

void disconnectGateWay()
Unbind from the gateway. If disconnected, no message sending will be possible. For unit testing purposes.

enableDebugInformation

void enableDebugInformation(boolean debug)
Enables or disables the debug Information

Parameters:
debug -

getConnectionStatus

boolean getConnectionStatus()
Return the status of this connection to the gateway.

getGatewayInfo

java.lang.String getGatewayInfo()
Get some info about the remote gateway.

processMessageRemotely

void processMessageRemotely()
Call an external service to handle the processing of an outgoing message. This could be a simple php script or another Java service.

sendMessagesToGateway

java.lang.String sendMessagesToGateway(java.util.Set<org.sakaiproject.sms.hibernate.model.SmsMessage> messages)
Send a list of messages to the gateway. Abort if the gateway connection is down or gateway returns an error and mark relevant messages as failed. Return message statuses back to caller.

sendMessageToGateway

org.sakaiproject.sms.hibernate.model.SmsMessage sendMessageToGateway(org.sakaiproject.sms.hibernate.model.SmsMessage message)
Send one message to the SMS gateway. Return result code to caller.
